DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate , term WHO objectives clinical benefit , patient locally advance metastatic pancreatic biliary adenocarcinoma treat gemcitabine , leucovorin calcium , fluorouracil . II . Determine tolerance regimen patient population . III . Determine survival without disease progression patient treat regimen . IV . Determine overall survival patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV 2 hour follow fluorouracil IV 24 hour day 1 follow gemcitabine IV 80-150 minute day 2 . Treatment repeat every 2 week minimum 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response may continue chemotherapy 1 year . Patients locally advance disease 3 month chemotherapy may receive concurrent radiotherapy chemotherapy 5 week , may undergo surgical resection . Fluorouracil-based chemotherapy ( without radiotherapy ) may resume surgery . Patients follow survival . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 14-39 patient accrue study .
